EmailTemplate.name: Email Follow Up - In Progress
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Luxury Presence revisions are under way
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for reaching out to Luxury Presence Support! I'll be happy to help.
We've received your email and the following edits are underway:
Edits | Revisions
We'll reach out if we need any additional information, and we'll have an update for you soon! In the meantime, feel free to let us know if you have any questions!
Have a wonderful day!
Best regards, {!User.FirstName} Luxury Presence Support (310) 955-1077 support@luxurypresence.com
